page.title: 13National News
page.content: {The Miners Strike The Miners strike started in March 1984 and it ended in April 1985. There was a great deal of violence on the Picket lines. There was heavy Picketing. Many Pickets were arrested. {Famine Nearly everyone in Britain has been raising money to send for famine relief in Ethiopia where many people are dying due to the drought. {Bradford Fire The main stand of Bradford football stadium caught alight and fans scrambled to get on to the pitch. This event occurred in the 44th minute of the match versus Lincoln city. There were at least 58 people burnt to death.
